column5: Caught part of the show here on the showcase channel and was astounded that they bleeped all the swearing.  Whats up, can anyone give me some history on why its censored.  It was down right bleeping annoying.
Hey .. i watch it on showcase and no bleeping ... but anytime i watch it is after 9 pm .. maybe they have to beep it before a certain time .. incase the kids happen to see it
It's bleeped in the afternoon and uncut after 9:00pm.  I hope that answers your bleeping question.

Ricky: [about their illegal gas station] Regular goes into this can, supremium into this one and diesel into that one. Cory: How do we know which is which? Ricky: By tasting, you moron. Regular tastes sour, supremium tastes a little tangy and diesel actually tastes pretty good.

Hey that makes sense here since I saw it a 7.  I guess Ill toon in after 9 if that the case as it was bleeping painful to watch.  After a layoff from the show I figure Ill catch up.  Awesome show especially being Canadian.  love that J ROCK.
I heard that the USA channel providers must bleep out any vulgarity.
